# <s class="topic-title">[[human advancement]]</s>

##### ^blurb

Human advancement is the 
damage left in the wake of the human [[social order]],
and the craft of changing it for the better.

A vital 
part of:: [[human experience]]


##### Outline

see:: [[human experience]]
